section-block.flip_chart-concept-question: How can we be a good friend?

flip_chart-teacher-facing-content-box.flip_chart-teacher-facing-paragraph: Alisha told her mom how much she likes playing with her good friend Rico. So her mom suggested that they write Rico an email to let him know.

flip_chart-teacher-facing-paragraph.flip_chart-bold: Dear Rico, Thank you for being a good friend to me. I like when we play superheroes. I think it’s nice when you take turns with me on the swings. You are so good at doing puzzles! I like when we read books together. I’m glad we are friends. From, Alisha
Good friends like to do things together. Good friends share and take turns. Good friends do nice things for each other.
